name: Pinkpop

config_properties.name: Pinkpop
config_properties.description: The longest-running annual music festival in the Netherlands, held in Landgraaf since 1970.

ai_profile:
**Pinkpop 2026 Festival Profile**

Pinkpop 2026 promises a dynamic lineup of 32 artists, showcasing a rich blend of genres and styles. With Alternative Rock (8 acts), Pop (7 acts), and Indie Rock (6 acts) leading the charge, this year’s festival celebrates a strong alternative and indie music presence, while also exploring diverse subgenres like Post-Punk, Electropop, and Punk Rock. Every artist featured in the lineup is available on Spotify, ensuring accessibility for fans eager to discover or revisit their music before the event.

The festival boasts an impressive international roster, with artists hailing from the United Kingdom and the United States (9 each), as well as strong representation from the Netherlands (7). Additional acts from Germany, Canada, Australia, Belgium, and Sweden add to the event’s global appeal. While the majority of performers are male (20), Pinkpop 2026 also highlights female (8) and mixed-gender (4) acts, reflecting an effort toward gender inclusivity. However, the festival has room to grow in terms of representation, with only one artist identifying as a person of color.

Audience feedback has been mostly positive, with all 32 artists rated and an average score of 6.88. The majority of acts received ratings in the 7-8 range, indicating a solid lineup with broad appeal. Pinkpop continues its legacy as a platform for a variety of genres and artists, offering something for everyone while maintaining a focus on alternative and indie music as its core identity.
